text:
Remember Hangover's Famous Monkey 'Crystal'? He Is All Set To Mark His Bollywood Debut With Total Dhamaal
Remember Hangover's Famous Monkey 'Crystal'? He Is All Set To Mark His Bollywood Debut With Total Dhamaal
Crystal, the monkey, who played the drug mule in Hangover II is all geared up for her big Bollywood debut.
New York Magazine
Well, yes. While you might be struggling with your 9-5 job, Capuchin monkey of Hollywood has made her big Bollywood debut in Total Dhamaal alongside stars like Ajay Devgn, Anil Kapoor, Madhuri Dixit-Nene, Riteish Deshmukh and Arshad Warsi.
Anil Kapoor and Ajay Devgn took to their social media handles to share the news.
Crystal will make you go 🙈🙉🙊 and lots more in #TotalDhamaal... hang in there at #WaitForIt.. Trailer out soon! 🐒 https://t.co/BVA9BqtVtk — Anil Kapoor (@AnilKapoor) January 14, 2019
"Say hi to Hollywood's head turner," he wrote, while also revealing that the movie's trailer is set to release soon.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
After starring in Hangover 2, George of the Jungle and Night at the Museum, she is set to make her Bollywood debut with Total Dhamaal! Watch out for Crystal!🐒😉 #TotalDhamaal trailer releasing soon! @ajaydevgn @ADFFilms @Indra_kumar_9 pic.twitter.com/4VRuv9h4VU — Fox Star Hindi (@foxstarhindi) January 14, 2019
Just to jog your memory a little, third film in the Dhamaal franchise is all set to release in 2019 and will be helmed by Indra Kumar.
